step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position. Ensure your arms are fully stretched overhead and fingers are spread wide.
You're doing well with the arm movement. Focus on making a firm fist and actively squeezing your shoulder blades together as you push down. Remember to inhale during this part.
Great job stretching your arms back overhead and exhaling. Keep the relaxation smooth as you transition to the next movement.
Your arm movements are good. Continue to focus on the squeezing of the shoulder blades and the full stretch overhead.
Excellent work on the repetitions. Ensure you are consistently making a tight fist and squeezing your shoulder blades together throughout the push-down phase.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Keep up the good work by stretching your arms overhead and making a firm fist as you push down. Remember to squeeze your shoulder blades together and breathe.
